column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////If Ba-Ba-Reeba were located in a small town
column2: I'd rate it higher (3 stars)... but it's located in one of the largest cities in the US
column4: flavor and freshness should be compared with places like Boqueria (Flatiron) and Olea (Ft. Greene) in NYC. Or even Spain? I've only lived in Andalucia (Southern Spain) and I think the comparison is similar to Chinese food in the US (babareeba) vs. Chinese food in China...
